Headline: #47 47th, #15 Jeffery Local, #51 51st and #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute near 47th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 47 47th, 15 Jeffery Local, 51 51st and 24 Wentworth buses are temp. rerouted in both directions near 47th/Wentworth, due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#47 47th, #15 Jeffery Local, #51 51st and #24 Wentworth  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Wentworth, due to street blockage near 47th/Wentworth.

Southbound #15 Jeffery Local buses will operate via 47th, Princeton, 51st, Wentowrth and over regular route.

Westbound #51 51st buses will operate via 47th, Princeton, 51st and over regular route.

Southbound #24 Wentworth buses will operate via Wentworth,  47th, Princeton, 51st, Wentworth and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a collision with a vehicle. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a collision with a vehicle. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81 Lawrence

#78 Montrose

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Kimball and Belmont in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

How will this affect my trip?
